<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{spaceId}/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all users that are mapped to the space

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
